title: The Wrong Way to Use Healing Magic
genres: Animation, Comedy, Action & Adventure, Sci-Fi & Fantasy
overview: An ordinary walk home from school turns into an epic journey for Usato. After suddenly being dropped into another world with two fellow students, Usato learns he was summoned there by accident. But things turn around when he discovers a unique aptitude for healing magic! Now, he trains beyond human limitations, using his self-healing abilities to gain absurd strength and unrivaled stamina.
